baseRule.text: 若比丘。非時入聚落不近白善比丘。除因緣。波逸提。因緣者。難時。是名因緣。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 83

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchāvikāle gāmaṁ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 85

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer, ohne einen anwesenden Mönch darüber zu informieren, zur Unzeit ein Dorf betritt, außer um eine angemessene, dringend nötige Angelegenheit zu erledigen, muß dafür sühnen.

If a monk, when another monk is available, enters an inhabited area at the wrong time without informing him, except if there is some appropriate urgent business, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, sin avisar a otro bhikkhu disponible, entra en un pueblo en el tiempo indebido, excepto si hay una emergencia apropiada: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。非時入聚落。不白善比丘。波夜提。除因緣。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: 若比丘過中入聚落。波夜提。除因緣
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻非時入聚落。不囑餘苾芻。除餘緣故。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。阿蘭若處住。非時入聚落。不白善比丘。除急事。波夜提。八十事竟
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 80

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！非時入聚落，不囑比丘者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 83

translations.text: If a monk, without the authority of the other monks, enter a village at an unusual hour (prohibited hour), it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu memasuki suatu kota atau desa pada waktu yang salah tanpa memberitahu bhikṣu lain, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘非時入聚落。不囑餘比丘者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 83

fullParallels.text: 若比丘非時入聚落不囑比丘者。波逸提。

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，非時入聚落，不囑比丘尼，波逸提。

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼非時入聚落。不白餘比丘尼。波夜提。除急因緣。

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼非時入聚落。不囑餘苾芻尼。除餘緣。故波逸底迦。
